                    .list article .marker,aside.left{font-family:"Roboto Condensed",sans-serif}aside.left{font-weight:300;width:200px;float:left;padding-right:1em;position:relative;font-size:.8em;line-height:1.1em}aside.left h4,aside.left.small-facets{font-family:"Work Sans","Helvetica Neue",Arial,sans-serif}aside.left .selected,aside.left h4{font-weight:700}aside.left+section{border-left:1px solid #e3e3e3;margin-left:200px;overflow:hidden;padding-left:3em;padding-top:1em;float:none}aside.left.sticky{position:fixed;top:5em;overflow-x:hidden;overflow-y:scroll;height:100%;padding-bottom:5em}aside.left ul{padding-left:0;list-style:none}aside.left li{padding:.25em 0}aside.left h4{color:#b43100}@media screen and (max-width:1024px){aside.left{display:none}aside.left+section{border-left:none;margin-left:0;padding:0}}aside.left .count{color:#bbb}aside.left .facet{-webkit-column-break-inside:avoid;page-break-inside:avoid;break-inside:avoid-column;display:table;width:100%;margin-bottom:1em;border-bottom:1px solid #c7c7c7}aside.left.small-facets{-moz-column-count:2;-webkit-column-count:2;-ms-column-count:2;column-count:2}aside.left .level-1{padding-left:1em}aside.left .level-2{padding-left:2em}aside.left .level-3{padding-left:3em}aside.left .level-4{padding-left:4em}aside.left .close{display:none}aside.left.small-facets{font-weight:400;display:none;position:relative;float:none;clear:both;border:none;z-index:1;width:100%;-webkit-transform:translate3d(0,0,0)}aside.left.small-facets ul{margin-left:.7em;line-height:1.2em}aside.left.small-facets h4{margin-left:.3em}.totals{margin:-1.5em 0 .5em;color:#555;font-size:.9em}.list figure{position:relative;float:left;width:225px;height:225px;text-align:center;vertical-align:middle;margin-right:.5em}.list figure+section{margin-left:225px;padding-left:.5em;float:none}.list article{position:relative;padding:1em;border-bottom:1px solid #e3e3e3;height:265px;overflow:hidden;line-height:1.6em}.list article screen and (max-width:1600px){.list article:nth-child(2n+1){border-right:1px solid #e3e3e3}.list article:nth-child(2n){border-right:none}}@media screen and (max-width:1279px){.list    <div id="products-submenus">
                               <div id="prod-fictiune" class="prod-submenu">
                <h4><a class="no-style" href="/carti/fictiune/f">Ficțiune</a></h4>
                                <ul class="col3 right">
                                                            <li class="strong"><a href="/top/carti/fictiune/f">Top vânzări</a></li>

                                                                                  <li><a href="/nominalizarile-nebula-2017-romane/l/65921">Nominalizările Nebula 2017: Romane</a></li>
                                                                                  <li><a href="/books-to-read-before-they-re-2017-movies/l/61746">Books to Read Before They're 2017 Movies</a></li>
                                                        </ul>
                
                                <ul class="col2 right">
                                                              <li class="strong">Autori celebri</li>
                                              
                                                                                <li><a href="/andrzej-sapkowski/c/1309945">Andrzej Sapkowski</a></li>

                                          <div id="prod-it" class="prod-submenu">
                <h4><a class="no-style" href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it/u">Calculatoare și IT</a></h4>
                                <ul class="col3 right">
                                                            <li class="strong"><a href="/top/carti/calculatoare-si-it/u">Top vânzări</a></li>

<h2>Cont</h2>

<div class="box shadow" id="newsletter">
    <h3 class="box-title">Categorii preferate newsletter</h3>
    <div class="view hidden">
  <div class="row form">
  
    <div class="12u$(xsmall) 7u small-label"><label>Momentan nu sunteți abonat la newsletter</label></div>
    <div class="12u$(xsmall) 5u$ small-label">
      <input type="radio" id="subscribe_yes" name="subscribe_yes" class="small" value="Y"><label for="subscribe_yes">Doresc să mă abonez</label>
    </div>
    
</div></div>
    <div class="editor">
<form>
    <div class="row form">
      <div class="12u$(xsmall) 5u small-label"><label for="languages">Limbile preferate</label></div>
      <div class="12u$(xsmall) 7u$">
          <select id="languages" name="languages" class="small select2-hidden-accessible" style="width: 100%" multiple="" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">
            <option value="rom">Română</option><option value="eng">Engleză</option><option value="ger">Germană</option><option value="spa">Spaniolă</option><option value="fre">Franceză</option><option value="ita">Italiană</option>
          </select><span class="select2 select2-container select2-container--default" dir="ltr" style="width: 100%;"><span class="selection"><span class="select2-selection select2-selection--multiple" role="combobox" aria-autocomplete="list" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0"><ul class="select2-selection__rendered"><li class="select2-search select2-search--inline"><input class="select2-search__field" type="search" tabindex="-1" autocomplete="off" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="none" spellcheck="false" role="textbox" placeholder="" style="width: 0.75em;"></li></ul></span></span><span class="dropdown-wrapper" aria-hidden="true"></span></span>
      </div>

      <div class="12u$(xsmall) 5u small-label"><label for="add-subject">Subiecte de interes</label></div>
      <div class="12u$(xsmall) 7u$">
          <a tabindex="0" href="#" class=" button alt align-left full small" id="add-subject"><i class="fa fa-open-down icon-right"></i>Adaugă subiect</a>
          <ul id="subjects" class="box select-list" style="margin-top: 0.5em">
          
              <li class="empty">Niciun subiect selectat</li> 
          </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
    <hr>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="12u$">
          <button type="button" class="button left primary save">Actualizare</button>
          <a href="/user/subscriptions/unsubscribe"><button type="button" class="button danger unsubscribe right">Dezabonare</button></a>
      </div>
    </div>
</form>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var data = {"user":{"first_name":"Oana","last_name":"Ujica","email":"oana.m.ujica@gmail.com"},"subscriber":false,"languages":[],"subjects":[],"all_languages":{"rom":{"code":"ro","name":"Rom\u00e2n\u0103"},"eng":{"code":"en","name":"Englez\u0103"},"ger":{"code":"de","name":"German\u0103"},"spa":{"code":"es","name":"Spaniol\u0103"},"fre":{"code":"fr","name":"Francez\u0103"},"ita":{"code":"it","name":"Italian\u0103"}}};
</script>

<script type="text/template" id="newsletter-view-template">
  <div class="row form">
  <% if(rc.subscriber.newsletter_subscriber_id) {%>
      <div class="12u$(xsmall) 5u small-label"><label>Limbile preferate</label></div>
      <div class="12u$(xsmall) 7u$">
       <% var length = data.languages.length

          for(var i in data.languages){
            length -= 1;
            if(length) 
              print(data.languages[i].name + ', ');
            else print(data.languages[i].name + ' ');
          } %>
      </div>

      <div class="12u$(xsmall) 5u small-label"><label>Subiecte de interes</label></div>
      <div class="12u$(xsmall) 7u$">
       <% var length = rc.subjects.length
          for(var j in rc.subjects){
            length -= 1;
            text = App.$subjects.find('[data-code="'+rc.subjects[j].subject+'"]').text();
            if(length)
              print(text + ', ');
            else 
              print(text); 
          } %>
    </div>
    </div>
    <hr>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="12u$">
      <button type="button" class="button primary edit">Modifică</button>
      </div>
    </div>
  <%} else { %>
    <div class="12u$(xsmall) 7u small-label"><label>Momentan nu sunteți abonat la newsletter</label></div>
    <div class="12u$(xsmall) 5u$ small-label">
      <input type="radio" id="subscribe_yes" name="subscribe_yes" class="small" value="Y"><label for="subscribe_yes">Doresc să mă abonez</label>
    </div>
    <%}%>
</script>

<script type="text/template" id="newsletter-edit-template">
<form>
    <div class="row form">
      <div class="12u$(xsmall) 5u small-label"><label for="languages">Limbile preferate</label></div>
      <div class="12u$(xsmall) 7u$">
          <select id="languages" name="languages" class="small" style="width: 100%" multiple>
            <% for(var i in data.all_languages){
                  var found = 0;
                  for(var j in rc.languages) 
                    if(data.all_languages[i].name == rc.languages[j].name){
                      found = 1;
                      break;
                    }
                    if (found)
                      print('<option value="'+i+'" selected="">'+data.all_languages[i].name+'</option>');
                    else print('<option value="'+i+'">'+data.all_languages[i].name+'</option>');
                } %>
          </select>
      </div>

      <div class="12u$(xsmall) 5u small-label"><label for="add-subject">Subiecte de interes</label></div>
      <div class="12u$(xsmall) 7u$">
          <a tabindex="0" href="#" class=" button alt align-left full small" id="add-subject"><i class="fa fa-open-down icon-right"></i>Adaugă subiect</a>
          <ul id="subjects" class="box select-list" style="margin-top: 0.5em">
          <%  if("subjects" in data && data.subjects.length > 0)
                  for(var j in rc.subjects){
                    text = App.$subjects.find('[data-code="'+rc.subjects[j].subject+'"]').text();
                    print('<li class="item" data-code="'+ rc.subjects[j].subject +'">'+ text +' <a href="#" class="item-del"><i class="fa fa-cancel-circled theme-5"></i></a></li>');
                  }
          %>
              <li class="empty">Niciun subiect selectat</li> 
          </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
    <hr>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="12u$">
          <button type="button" class="button left primary save">Actualizare</button>
          <a href="/user/subscriptions/unsubscribe"><button type="button" class="button danger unsubscribe right">Dezabonare</button></a>
      </div>
    </div>
</form>
</script>

<div id="subjects-data" class="hidden">

</div>

</section>

		<div style="clear: both;">&nbsp;</div>
			<footer id="footer" class="">
							    <div class="container history">
				    <h3>Istoricul tău de navigare
					    						    <div class="hlinks small">
						        <a href="/user/history">Vezi tot istoricul de navigare</a>
						    </div>
					    				    </h3>
				    <ul><li class="small"><a href="/javascript-the-definitive-guide-7e/p/utc,9781491952023"><img alt="JavaScript – The Definitive Guide, 7e" data-src="https://i2.books-express.ro/bs/9781491952023/javascript-the-definitive-guide-7e.jpg" src="https://i2.books-express.ro/bs/9781491952023/javascript-the-definitive-guide-7e.jpg" width="91" height="120"></a></li><li class="small"><a href="/head-first-design-patterns/p/um,9780596007126"><img alt="Head First Design Patterns" data-src="https://i2.books-express.ro/bs/9780596007126/head-first-design-patterns.jpg" src="https://i2.books-express.ro/bs/9780596007126/head-first-design-patterns.jpg" width="103" height="120"></a></li><li class="small"><a href="/javascript-the-definitive-guide-6e/p/umw,9780596805524"><img alt="JavaScript: The Definitive Guide 6e" data-src="https://i2.books-express.ro/bs/9780596805524/javascript-the-definitive-guide-6e.jpg" src="https://i2.books-express.ro/bs/9780596805524/javascript-the-definitive-guide-6e.jpg" width="91" height="120"></a></li><li class="small"><a href="/css-the-definitive-guide-4e/p/umw,9781449393199"><img alt="CSS – The Definitive Guide 4e" data-src="https://i4.books-express.ro/bs/9781449393199/css-the-definitive-guide-4e.jpg" src="https://i4.books-express.ro/bs/9781449393199/css-the-definitive-guide-4e.jpg" width="91" height="120"></a></li><li class="small"><a href="/the-pragmatic-programmer-journey-to-mastery-20th-anniversary-edition-2-e/p/um,9780135957059"><img alt="The Pragmatic Programmer: journey to mastery, 20th Anniversary Edition, 2/e" data-src="https://i0.books-express.ro/bs/9780135957059/the-pragmatic-programmer-journey-to-mastery-20th-anniversary-edition-2-e.jpg" src="https://i0.books-express.ro/bs/9780135957059/the-pragmatic-programmer-journey-to-mastery-20th-anniversary-edition-2-e.jpg" width="91" height="120"></a></li><li class="small"><a href="/best-of-greece-the-greek-islands/p/wth,9781788686389"><img alt="Best of Greece &amp; the Greek Islands" data-src="https://i3.books-express.ro/bs/9781788686389/best-of-greece-the-greek-islands.jpg" src="https://i3.books-express.ro/bs/9781788686389/best-of-greece-the-greek-islands.jpg" width="77" height="120"></a></li></ul>
			    </div>		
				<div class="container">
					<div class="row double columns">
						<div class="3u 6u(medium) 12u$(small)">
							<h3><i class="fa fa-truck"></i> Livrare gratuită</h3>
							<p>La comenzi începând cu 300 lei, prin Fan Courier sau GLS oriunde în România.</p>
							<h3><i class="fa fa-credit-card"></i> Cumperi în siguranță</h3>
							<p>Plata la primirea coletului, sau poți plăti în rate fără dobândă.</p>

    <script data-no-min="">
    function rc(id, name){
        var el = document.getElementById(id);
        el.className = el.className.replace(name, '');
    }
    function onloadCSS(e,n){function t(){!o&&n&&(o=!0,n.call(e))}var o;e.addEventListener&&e.addEventListener("load",t),e.attachEvent&&e.attachEvent("onload",t),"isApplicationInstalled"in navigator&&"onloadcssdefined"in e&&e.onloadcssdefined(t)}!function(e){"use strict";var n=function(n,t,o){function a(e){return l.body?e():void setTimeout(function(){a(e)})}function d(){r.addEventListener&&r.removeEventListener("load",d),r.media=o||"all"}var i,l=e.document,r=l.createElement("link");if(t)i=t;else{var s=(l.body||l.getElementsByTagName("head")[0]).childNodes;i=s[s.length-1]}var f=l.styleSheets;r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,r.media="only x",a(function(){i.parentNode.insertBefore(r,t?i:i.nextSibling)});var c=function(e){for(var n=r.href,t=f.length;t--;)if(f[t].href===n)return e();setTimeout(function(){c(e)})};return r.addEventListener&&r.addEventListener("load",d),r.onloadcssdefined=c,c(d),r};"undefined"!=typeof exports?exports.loadCSS=n:e.loadCSS=n}("undefined"!=typeof global?global:this);

    var addEventsListener=function(o,t,e){var n,i=t.split(" ");for(n in i)o.addEventListener(i[n],e)}
    !function(){function t(t){this.el=t;for(var n=t.className.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"").split(/\s+/),i=0;i<n.length;i++)e.call(this,n[i])}function n(t,n,i){Object.defineProperty?Object.defineProperty(t,n,{get:i}):t.__defineGetter__(n,i)}if(!("undefined"==typeof window.Element||"classList"in document.documentElement)){var i=Array.prototype,e=i.push,s=i.splice,o=i.join;t.prototype={add:function(t){this.contains(t)||(e.call(this,t),this.el.className=this.toString())},contains:function(t){return-1!=this.el.className.indexOf(t)},item:function(t){return this[t]||null},remove:function(t){if(this.contains(t)){for(var n=0;n<this.length&&this[n]!=t;n++);s.call(this,n,1),this.el.className=this.toString()}},toString:function(){return o.call(this," ")},toggle:function(t){return this.contains(t)?this.remove(t):this.add(t),this.contains(t)}},window.DOMTokenList=t,n(Element.prototype,"classList",function(){return new t(this)})}}();

    var myNav = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
    var ieVer = (myNav.indexOf('msie') != -1) ? parseInt(myNav.split('msie')[1]) : false;
    var App = window.App || {};
    App.is_logged = true;
    App.imgBase = "i0";
    function labInit(){

        loadCSS("/css/libs_1490280474.css");
        var ml = loadCSS("/css/main_1610570146.css");
        /*
        onloadCSS( ml, function() {
            document.getElementById("spinner").className += ' hidden';
            rc('main', 'ws');
        });
        */

        onloadCSS( ml, function() {
            var elems = document.getElementsByTagName('*'), i;
            for (i in elems) {
                if((' ' + elems[i].className + ' ').indexOf(' ws ')> -1) {
                    elems[i].className = elems[i].className.replace('ws', '');
                }
            }
        });

        loadCSS("/css/select2_1445974926.css");    $LAB
    .script(function(){
        if(ieVer !== false && ieVer <= 8){
            return '/js/html5shiv.js';
        }
    })
    .script('/js/skel.min.js').wait(function(){
    skel.breakpoints({
      xxlarge: '(max-width: 5000px)',
      xlarge: '(max-width: 1600px)',
      large: '(max-width: 1280px)',
      medium: '(max-width: 1024px)',
      small: '(max-width: 736px)',
      xsmall: '(max-width: 480px)'
    });
    rc('top-logo', 'ws');
    rc('header', 'ws');
    rc('submenu', 'ws');
    })
    .script(function(){
        if(ieVer !== false && ieVer < 9){
            return "/js/jquery-1.11.3.min.js";
        }else{
            return "/js/jquery-2.1.4.min.js";
        }
    }).wait()
    .script("/js/libs_1484923518.js").script("/polyglot.i18n.js").script("/js/main_1585304528.js").wait(function(){App.mainInit()}).script("/js/select2.full.min_1445974926.js").script("/js/subscriber_1488246321.js")}</script>
